content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.UserDetails(
           StoredProcedureName nvarchar(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION='salesforce/jsonfiles/user.json',
    DATA_SOURCE=ds_ba_poc_adls,
    FILE_FORMAT=csvFileformat
);




CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT jsonFileformat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = json,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '0x0A',
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8' )
);
